entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 10 except plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 10 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 24 April 2023
